scripts.prep: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/css && cp -r demo dist/ && cp -r fonts dist/ && cp -r js dist/
scripts.build:css: lessc less/inviscss.less dist/css/inviscss.css --autoprefix && lessc demo/less/admin-demo.less dist/demo/css/admin-demo.css --autoprefix
scripts.build:css.min: lessc less/inviscss.less --autoprefix --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --compatibility=ie9"  dist/css/inviscss.min.css  && lessc demo/less/admin-demo.less dist/demo/css/admin-demo.min.css --autoprefix  --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --compatibility=ie9"
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build:css && npm run build:css.min && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:open: echo 'building...' && npm run -s build && echo 'done' && open dist/demo/index.html
